Package org.cid15.aem.veneer.core.components

Class AbstractComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cid15.aem.veneer.core.components.AbstractComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adaptable, Accessible, Inheritable, Linkable, VeneeredResource, Traversable<VeneeredResource>
    public abstract class AbstractComponent
extends Object
implements VeneeredResource
    Base class for AEM component classes.

        Get a multi-valued property from the current resource as a list of the given type.

        T - property type, must be supported by ValueMap
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of multi-valued property
        type - property type
        Returns:
        list of property values or an empty list if the property does not exist

      • getInherited

        public final <T> Optional<T> getInherited​(String propertyName,
                                          Class<T> type)
        Description copied from interface: Inheritable
        Get a property value from the current resource. If no value is found, traverse up the content tree respective to the page and relative resource path until a value is found, returning an absent Optional if not. This returns the same value as the underlying ValueMap wrapped in an Optional instance instead of returning null.
        Specified by:
        getInherited in interface Inheritable
        Type Parameters:
        T - type
        Parameters:
        propertyName - property name
        type - property type
        Returns:
        Optional of the given type containing the property value or absent if no value is found
